feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.06.02
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • c82beb6 feature: Vastly improved logs and tests for killing actions (#330)

Bug fixes

  • ffc17dd bugfix: Terminal width fitting (#329)

Others

  • 00a8a0b fmt: Center argument-wrapper #327, point 5 (#331)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.06.02

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.06.02

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.07.03
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • fb6aaa5 feature: New diagnostics page, showing SSH keys found. (#344)
  • 943b4c7 feature: Password type (no validation) (#340)

Bug fixes

  • fb972fa bugfix: Handle update failed update checks silently (#342)
  • 6622a6d bugfix: Kill the process group, not just the parent process (#328), , thanks @ioqy, @vvrein (#346)
  • a1adc2a bugfix: Output width in chrome (#345)

Others

  • e36fedf Check for updates default disabled (#333)
  • 3d9cb62 build(deps-dev): bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /integration-tests
  • eb4f28d build(deps-dev): bump ws from 8.16.0 to 8.17.1 in /integration-tests (#335)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.07.03

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.07.03

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
